<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Backpack](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2704)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 287 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1 sp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A backpack holds up to 4 Bulk of items, and the first 2 Bulk of these items don't count against your Bulk limits. If you're carrying or stowing the pack rather than wearing it on your back, its Bulk is light instead of negligible.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Backpack
